page.title: 05WINTON HOUSE
page.content: Outside the well kept gardens complement the general interior condition of the house.{History The previous owners include,the de Quincey family,the de Sayton family,William the Lion,the Seton family,York Buildings Company,Mrs. Hamilton Nisbet,Col.Hamilton,Lady Ruthven,Constance Nisbet Hamilton,Harry Ogilvy,Gilbert F.M.Ogilvy and Sir David J.W.Ogilvy,Bart. Under Scotlands Gardens Scheme , an annual Open Day is held at Winton, usually in the spring,you can wander freely around the gardens and the house is open to all visitors. {
